hero.title: Get in Touch

teamContacts.title: Our Team
teamContacts.subtitle: Connect directly with our team members who can help with your specific needs.

members.name: Alex Johnson
members.bio: Alex has been helping our customers for over 5 years and specializes in onboarding and technical support.

members.name: Maria Garcia
members.bio: Maria leads our sales team and can help with pricing, enterprise plans, and partnerships.

members.name: Sam Wilson
members.bio: Sam is our API and integration expert who can help with technical implementation questions.
